description: This file initializes and runs an agent that interacts with a PDF knowledge base and a Clickhouse vector database, primarily for recipe-related queries.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Main class representing the agent that handles knowledge and storage.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Class representing a PDF-based knowledge base.

classes.name: SqliteAgentStorage
classes.description: Class for SQLite storage backend for the agent.

classes.name: Clickhouse
classes.description: Class representing the Clickhouse vector database connection.

methods.name: agent.knowledge.aload
methods.description: Asynchronously loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating it.

methods.name: agent.aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously generates and prints a response to a query.
